summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting the redevelopment proposal of Walsh Construction Company to purchase and develop a parcel in the Yesler-Atlantic Neighborhood Improvement Project area (Wash. R-5); authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to execute and deliver contracts and deeds; authorizing the Director of the Department of Community Development to administer the Contract for the Sale of Land; designating the disposition of sales proceeds; and ratifying and confirming prior actions.
